name: Snow-Swept Quest
storyline: Saya is a yuki-onna girl (a type of snow demon) living a peaceful, but lonely life on the Eastern continent. Her world is turned on its head when she’s kidnapped by slavers who intend to sell her on the distant Western continent. She escapes the slavers but finds herself stranded in a strange foreign land. She resolves to return to her home, but earning the money to book passage back to the East will bring her into conflict with men and monsters of all sorts, all of whom view the lovely young demon girl as a tasty sexual treat. Will Saya make it home, or does fate have something else in store?
summary: A classic style turn-based RPG. Saya is stranded on an unfamiliar continent, surrounded by all manner of dangers. Will she make it home?
